name: Bard
proficiencies: Saving Throw: DEX +4 | Saving Throw: WIS +3 | Skill: Acrobatics +4 | Skill: Perception +5, Performance +6

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
special_abilities.desc: The bard is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following bard spells prepared:

special_abilities.name: Song of Rest.
special_abilities.desc: The bard can perform a song while taking a short rest. Any ally who hears the song regains an extra 1d6 hit points if it spends any Hit Dice to regain hit points at the end of that rest. The bard can confer this benefit on itself as well.

special_abilities.name: Taunt (2/Day).
special_abilities.desc: The bard can use a bonus action on its turn to target one creature within 30 feet of it. If the target can hear the bard, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of the bardâ€™s next turn.

actions.name: Shortsword.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow.
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
